column1: Today I wrote to @FBI Director Christopher Wray & Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Court (FISC) Judge Rosemary Collyer urging adoption of my proposed reform to prevent politically funded opposition research from being used as evidence in the FISC. READ: https://t.co/TLU3XAgIeS https://t.co/dnsNNM7qqo

I successfully advocated for a year long extension of the Health Care Coverage Tax Credit which many Delphi Salaried Retirees rely on to afford health care to be included in the appropriations package that passed the House yesterday. Learn more here: https://t.co/EXNLcZiFu1

🚨🚨🚨Major funding included in today's appropriations packages for #OH10: ✅$120.9M for @WrightPattAFB ✅reauthorization of @visit_NAHA ✅access to millions in additional funding for scholarships & research for @CentralState87 Learn more by clicking here: https://t.co/UGkMpVPKl1

I strongly support this year's #NDAA. To learn about how the bill bolsters @WrightPattAFB helps @cityofdayton address PFAS and further addresses military sexual assault click here: https://t.co/qmXbJPz5aY https://t.co/cfyE5lzVxv
Q: No one on this planet told you that @POTUS was tying aid to investigations yes or no?  A: Yes. https://t.co/EFUgPDU8x2
Learn more by clicking here: https://t.co/NtOo3i0E5i

🚨Fostering Stable Housing Opportunities Act has passed the House! This is a huge step fwd in our fight to end federally created homelessness for youth who all too often struggle to find safe stable housing during the overnight transition from foster care➡️independent adulthood. https://t.co/m8g5IgfiGM

It is crystal clear that @RepAdamSchiff's investigation has a problem. Watch my full interview on @FoxNews's @AmericaNewsroom with @SandraSmithFox about yesterday's first public impeachment hearing. https://t.co/GdR3FbnZ3B

I attended the Ohio Veterans Hall of Fame Induction Ceremony where Howard “Bud” May Merle Wilberding and Dr. Kathy Platoni were inducted. Congrats to each of them for this monumental achievement and thank you to all of our veterans for your service. #VeteransDay https://t.co/jazjdlJKc1

My daughter & I solemnly watched the police escort in honor of slain @DaytonPolice Det. Del Rio as it progressed down Main St in Downtown Dayton this evening. We prayed for Det. Del Rio & his family & encourage everyone to keep our first responders who keep us safe in our prayers

Great to join @IngrahamAngle with @RepLeeZeldin & @RepChrisStewart tonight to discuss the importance of the American public being able to see this impeachment investigation firsthand. Watch the full segment here: https://t.co/85EIQ2OuAb
I support our #2A right & we must work to promote responsible gun safety. I am proud to cosponsor this bill to incentivize safe storage devices for firearms. https://t.co/SMeCPXyP7j
I am deeply disappointed that @SpeakerPelosi still has not put a single bill on the House floor for a vote to address gun violence since the Dayton mass shooting.

I support this step towards addressing the issue of mass shootings. We must engage in a bipartisan national conversation and take action to prevent tragedies like the one that occurred in Dayton.  via @whiotv https://t.co/Nx3XN9hcnR

Great news! Last year @ the request of @usairforce Sec Wilson I asked @peggylehner @bobdhackett @RepJimButler & @RepPerales to introduce this bill. It's now headed to @GovMikeDeWine's desk to become law & is another way Ohio is going above & beyond to support military families. https://t.co/yLXaUguKsn

Quote of the day: “I am the Chief of a garage start-up started by Orville & Wilbur Wright.” - @GenDaveGoldfein  Thank you @SecAFOfficial & Gen. Goldfein for joining the Air Force Caucus for breakfast today & continuing the Wright Brothers' innovative spirit in @usairforce's work.

.@HouseDemocrats' impeachment process is being done in secret which I believe is a violation of the Constitution & the rights of the American public. They are preventing Members of Congress from telling our constituents what they are doing behind closed doors. https://t.co/cQHpYfvOVX
Great to be at #AUSA2019 with @SecArmy today https://t.co/aKNmWV5KBb

#OH10's Wright Brothers flew their new invention over the Capitol & the White House. Today I joined @HyperloopOne in Washington to welcome the next advancement in transportation. Learn more here: https://t.co/5GwvORlDFO https://t.co/t0CdAJpCOX

Thank you @ywcadayton for your support on my bill with @RepKathleenRice to improve domestic violence records reporting & keep domestic abusers from obtaining firearms.  #WATCH via @WDTN: https://t.co/uwuRb7JSXf

.@SpeakerPelosi’s impeachment inquiry is being conducted in secret hearings with potentially secret witnesses & has a secret inception. Read my letter to her calling for the transparency the American public & our constitutional process deserve: https://t.co/Chbc7thyv1 https://t.co/ZV1MNPyoiP

We continue to hear the same story after each mass shooting: there were warning signs that the shooter should not have had access to a firearm. The mass shooter in Dayton passed a background check. We need to do more to prevent these tragedies.

I am proud to be the Republican lead on this bill to take reasonable steps towards improving the way we report domestic violence criminal history and mental health cases to protect our citizens and save lives. https://t.co/LnmJvb3RYi
My statement on Kurt Volker’s testimony today at @HouseIntelComm: https://t.co/ZgVXuuxEg1
@whiotv Watch the full program with @JOtteWHIO here: https://t.co/Iwkr7TdTDo
Be sure to tune in to @whiotv at 11:30am today to learn about what I’m doing to protect patients with pre-existing conditions.
Great to see @usairforce @ActingSecAF at @AirForceAssoc #ASC19 today. https://t.co/YNbxUID7cY
Tonight I joined @CNN's @ErinBurnett on @OutFrontCNN to discuss gun reform. Watch the full segment here: https://t.co/cEgacblcAk https://t.co/0zRiJwwxfo
Today I joined @MSNBC’s @Morning_Joe to discuss gun reform following the mass shooting in Dayton. Watch the full clip here: https://t.co/CaKP5WynjZ https://t.co/Szanl6RSR4

The hypocrisy of @afactoryfilm is astounding. @BarackObama fails to acknowledge his direct role in creating the hardships the Moraine workers weathered.  Read my opinion in @WSJ: https://t.co/9hJ8j1WJK6
I will continue to work with my colleagues across the aisle to make our country safer. Read more about the bill here: https://t.co/1Or7tcFNSu

This week I introduced The Safe Homefront Act w/@GerryConnolly & @RepPeteKing to help close those loopholes & ensure that convicted abusers within the service branches are incapable of possessing firearms. Bills like this are strong steps forward in preventing future tragedies.
#SutherlandSpringsShooting exposed failures in @DeptofDefense's processes for reporting military convictions to civilian authorities.

Today @RepDean & I introduced the Fostering Stable Housing Opportunities Act to help break the cycle of federally created homelessness in which youth are currently aging out of foster care and into homelessness. Read more here: https://t.co/ffESUmzh6i https://t.co/xyH6ifRdat
The incredible heroes who ran towards the danger to save lives on this horrific day 18 years ago are #NeverForgotten. https://t.co/Pa7ct6eaeo

I was honored to host @DaytonPolice & their families in the Capitol yesterday. After receiving the Medal of Valor at the @WhiteHouse they sat in the House Gallery as I thanked them for their heroism & led a moment of silence for the victims of the mass shooting in Dayton. https://t.co/bgGAawwvyu
Tonight I led 32 seconds of silence on the House Floor to honor the victims of the mass shooting in Dayton & thank @DaytonPolice. You can watch the full clip here: https://t.co/IEwfC0WnEU

As the lead Republican and co-author of the legislation to establish the joint US-Israeli missile defense system—Iron Dome. I’m glad to see today the @USArmy finalized a deal to procure Iron Dome for our servicemen and women deployed in harm’s way. https://t.co/SSmLzvnFT0
Today I announced my support for restricting military style weapon sales magazine limits and red flag legislation. Read my full statement here: https://t.co/HFpxBTAjcL

My daughter & friend fled into #OregonDistrict & contacted me at 2am. As they ran home I followed their progress & prayed for them & our community. Thank you to @DaytonPolice for their bravery in stopping this evil.

My daughter & a family friend had just entered the Tumbleweed Connection when the shooting began across the street. Both reported of the visible @DaytonPolice presence before the shooting and the bravery they witnessed as officers ran toward the gun shots.

Russia killed #INFtreaty by repeatedly violating it placing Europe & US at risk with its new nuclear missiles & weapons. A treaty can’t be with one party. Russia failed to become compliant within a 6 month deadline bringing into question our nuclear arms agreements.

#Apollo11's journey was probably the first time since Thomas Jefferson sent Lewis and Clark to explore the Louisiana Purchase where man didn’t know what they were going to find. Today we celebrate its incredible journey 50 years later. #Apollo50 📸: @NASA https://t.co/y3J2TEVdb3
Today I joined @FoxNews @OutnumberedOT with @HARRISFAULKNER to preview Special Counsel Robert Mueller's testimony next week at the House Intelligence Committee. https://t.co/J9BJJ7ySXL

I am confident that every Member of Congress is a committed American. @realDonaldTrump’s tweets from this weekend were racist and he should apologize. We must work as a country to rise above hate not enable it.

I have long supported the effort to #Renew911VCF permanently & was an early co-sponsor of this bill. Today the House acted to ensure these men and women receive the compensation they deserve. #READ more: https://t.co/TbUI761wRJ
I look forward to working with my colleagues in conference to craft a final #FY20NDAA that supports our troops and keeps our country safe.

As I have repeatedly stated #FY20NDAA undermines our national security weakens our defenses & emboldens our adversaries to challenge us. This bill is so extreme it will never become law. I am disheartened by this staggering break in our tradition of bipartisanship on defense.
.@HouseDemocrats' #FY20NDAA makes our country less safe and I could not support it.
Today I joined @GOPLeader & @HouseGOP in explaining how @HouseDemocrats’ #FY20NDAA makes us less safe. https://t.co/V5E8WS3mrX
Today the House will vote on my amendment to remove a provision by @HouseDemocrats in #FY20NDAA that is unilateral nuclear disarmament. https://t.co/PJoE2g1FmP
Today’s passage of my amendment in the House will provide greater transparency to communities like mine to reduce #PFAS in our water.

#OH10 is anchored by @WrightPattAFB. Our base like many others around the nation continues to deal with the detection of #PFAS in our groundwater. The most basic need of any community is access to safe clean water.
I am disappointed by @HouseDemocrats's #FY20NDAA. This bill in its totality makes us less safe. https://t.co/cmIUJCfCvw

Those impacted by the #MemorialDay tornado outbreak are encouraged to register a claim with @fema by August 19 to see if you qualify for federal assistance. Please contact my Dayton office at 937-225-2843 for any additional assistance. https://t.co/n5O2TrliYs

.@HouseIntelComm should focus on our adversaries. It makes us less safe when we don't. Watch my full interview on @FoxNews's @seanhannity with guest host @jasoninthehouse here: https://t.co/seXEjg3O2y
I am concerned that mismanagement and corruption at City Hall may affect federal dollars for @cityofdayton. Read my letter to @nanwhaley here: https://t.co/30FXdj3mcn https://t.co/01L7XytCbt

For years I have worked on a bipartisan basis to combat the deadly #OpioidCrisis. I am proud to co-sponsor the CREATE Opportunities Act to help improve access to substance abuse treatment for incarcerated individuals. https://t.co/gxwQo0svTC

If you or someone you know was impacted directly by the #MemorialDay tornado outbreak please visit the new Disaster Relief Center now open in #Beavercreek. Please also contact my Dayton office at 937-225-2843 for further assistance. https://t.co/wI6bLxInRZ
.@POTUS has shown restraint in response to attacks by Iran and @RepRoKhanna's amendment would needlessly restrict his military options.

Legislating against our Commander in Chief’s ability to defend our country and its allies is a threat to our national security and dangerously emboldens Iran and its proxy terrorist organizations Hamas and Hezbollah which threaten our ally Israel.
Joining @FoxNews @SundayFutures with @MariaBartiromo at 10am to discuss Iran. Tune in!

Yesterday in the Capitol Rotunda I proudly watched my daughter Carolyn be commissioned as a Second Lieutenant as she will be pursuing a degree to become a physician in @usairforce. It was an incredible honor to watch one of my children dedicate herself to serving our nation. https://t.co/ahflAu7Vwg

Today I was honored to present these students with the Congressional Award Gold Medal for initiative service and achievement. I am so proud of all our #OH10 recipients for achieving this incredible honor and look forward to seeing what the future has in store for them. https://t.co/qKjQYEBwzN
Great discussion this morning on @CNN @NewDay with Alisyn Camerota about rising tensions with #Iran. https://t.co/oYWsIQNeoA
Joining @TeamCavuto live on @FoxBusiness now to discuss escalating tensions with Iran. Tune in! https://t.co/64qw5kJm0j
Today was a political show of legislative malpractice. Read my full statement on #FY20NDAA here: https://t.co/0IPOzo6BsG
#FY20NDAA's Strategic Forces Subcommittee mark restricts the ability of the U.S. to defend itself. Read my explanation in @WSJ here: https://t.co/4aRchqBuVd
The House Armed Services Committee's debate on the annual defense bill is underway. You can watch the markup of #FY20NDAA here: https://t.co/608gOLJ4PD

This bill is a strong step forward in helping prevent sexual assault in the military. I have worked across the aisle for over a decade to create a safer work environment for our servicemembers. I am proud to continue that work with @RepLoriTrahan to address this critical issue. https://t.co/uvXHP8AXSK
Joining @FoxNews on @seanhannity's show with @dbongino now. Tune in!

Great story by @WDTN about the cleanup happening in Old North Dayton where @Plummer15 & I toured tornado damage today. I’ll be joining WDTN in studio live at 7 to discuss what’s next for our community. https://t.co/1vntKyddxM
Unbelievably Congress is considering a restriction on the ability of the U.S. to defend itself. Read my opinion in @WSJ here: https://t.co/fhByFA8yOK
#OnThisDay 75 years ago Allied forces stormed the beaches of Normandy. Their bravery and heroism will never be forgotten. #WWII #DDay75 https://t.co/27l1Hmm0dI

.@RepSusanDavis and I introduced #STOPact to improve protections for victims of sexual assault in the military. This bill is a strong step forward in continuing to improve the safety of our men & women in uniform & the culture of the military. Read more: https://t.co/i7JfDHZJfZ https://t.co/PGPGKxWiC3
Great to have @McMahans in my DC office today to talk about the importance of propane and the positive impact this industry is having in #OH10. https://t.co/xddW2MYztA

We will be working together on the federal level along with state & local officials to rebuild our community. I want to again thank the first responders and media who saved countless lives through their work. https://t.co/fMKyYVzMNq

Today I hosted @GOPLeader in #OH10 to be briefed by local officials & tour the extensive damage in our community from these tornadoes. I want to thank Kevin for coming to Ohio to see the devastation firsthand. https://t.co/nlDvMT7rQV

This afternoon I welcomed @GovMikeDeWine in @CityOfTrotwood with @mayormmcdonald to survey the severe storm damage in #OH10. I look forward to working with our other federal state and local officials to rebuild our community. https://t.co/fZ2PMP3lxr

My daughter Jessica captured this photo of a tornado from downtown Dayton last night. Incredibly devastating to see the damage these storms caused across our community. I’ll be joining @MikeDeWine to tour Montgomery & Greene Counties this afternoon. https://t.co/LSiizS7pjv
Today we honor the millions of brave Americans who fought and gave their lives to keep our country safe and free. Your ultimate sacrifice is not forgotten. #MemorialDay

Incredibly proud of our community for standing up to hate without violence. Thank you to @DaytonPolice and all law enforcement who helped keep everyone safe. Looking forward to washing Courthouse Square clean of hate tomorrow @ 2pm.

Last week I re-introduced the Fostering Stable Housing Opportunities Act to help break the issue of federally created homelessness in which youth are currently aging out of foster care and into homelessness. Learn more via @COXMG & @whiotv's @DoreyScheimer: https://t.co/UX63bTWkwN

Sad tonight about the news of the passing of I.M. Pei. The building he designed in downtown Dayton is a signature staple in our skyline. May his memory live on through his iconic achievements in architecture.

The National Flood Insurance Program continues to be reauthorized for short periods of time. Thank you @dabrnews for coming by my DC office today to discuss obtaining a long-term solution for reauthorization of the NFIP #OH10 https://t.co/3ipitRNT5f
Thank you to all the brave men and women in uniform who put their lives on the line to protect us. #NationalPoliceWeek https://t.co/IFFwIimMl3
Thank you to all military spouses for your personal sacrifice support and commitment to our country as your loved ones serve. #MilitarySpouseAppreciationDay 🇺🇸 https://t.co/xRBbEwWcMP
Small business drives the American economy providing hope and opportunity for millions of Americans. I will continue to support initiatives that create jobs #SmallBusinessWeek https://t.co/VSj8Fz4wgJ

Thank you to all the incredible teachers in #OH10 who dedicate their lives to educating our youth! #TeacherAppreciationDay 👩‍🏫👨‍🏫 https://t.co/qUKosWK0Wm

Today I reintroduced #TREATact to expand access to treatment and increase flexibility in how existing federal funding can be used to combat the #OpioidEpidemic. Learn more here: https://t.co/mMJMTkXpXZ

Great to meet students from #OH10's Montessori School of Dayton yesterday in my DC office. You can @visitthecapitol and schedule a @uscapitol tour by clicking here: https://t.co/8ef7ZGf7x5 https://t.co/Obnbw5TJQw

Today my bill to reauthorize @AviationHeritag had a hearing at @NatResources. With #OH10 being the birthplace of aviation I am proud to be the lead sponsor of this bill to preserve Dayton's National Aviation Heritage Area. Learn more here: https://t.co/ICm1IIe1Ny https://t.co/McE0YGKxQL
I stand strongly with the Jewish community in the fight against anti-Semitism. The victims of the Holocaust will not be forgotten. #HolocaustRemembranceWeek https://t.co/aJ47czpHP1

Hospitals are reimbursed an average of only 87¢ of every $1 they spend caring for Medicare patients. #MedicareForAll would inevitably result in hospital closures & decrease patients' access to lifesaving health care. It is not a solution to Democrats' broken Obamacare system. https://t.co/OYmzx8uwlp
National Prescription Drug #TakeBackDay is today. Find a collection site near you to safely dispose of unused pharmaceuticals by visiting https://t.co/4QoDGqSTFt.  #OH10 https://t.co/h3jDprexmP

I was proud to support legislation to award the Doolittle Tokyo Raiders with a well deserved Congressional Gold Medal which they received in 2014. May Lt. Col. Cole rest in peace along with his fellow brave servicemen whose goblets have been turned over.

I was deeply saddened to hear of the loss of Lt. Col. Richard E. Cole the last survivor of the Doolittle Tokyo Raiders and a Dayton native. The Doolittle Tokyo Raiders displayed tremendous patriotism and heroism in World War II putting their country before themselves. https://t.co/ZWipoOXtoL

#FY2020 budget request for atomic energy defense activities recognizes importance of: ✓warhead life extensions ✓low-yield warhead development & production ✓continuing need to modernize our aging defense-related nuclear infrastructure  Watch #HASC live➡https://t.co/kv4T1OGa5H

Doing so ensures our continued dominance of the skies enables the realization of cost savings & assures our partners that we are committed to 5th Generation Aircraft.   Read the letter here: https://t.co/hxGMGnJOMp
.@thef35's unique capabilities & lethality have enhanced our air superiority and bolstered our ability to deter adversaries. Now is the time to increase procurement to match emerging threats.
Last week @RepJohnLarson @RepVeasey @RepMarthaRoby & I announced record support for @thef35 program with 103 bipartisan Members of Congress signing on to request 102 F-35 aircraft in FY2020.
This weekend I joined @FoxNews's @DavidAsmanfox to discuss the Special Counsel's report. You can watch the full clip here: https://t.co/C9W5q92141

This resolution is a clear signal of the United States’s steadfast commitment to @NATO. Together the 29 soon to be 30 members of NATO represent the most powerful military and diplomatic alliance in history and our unity ensures our shared success. https://t.co/G3sMkQuJaD

Today @GerryConnolly and I introduced a resolution celebrating #NATO70. @NATO uniquely unites its member states on the common ground of shared values which is why it has been able to endure and remain critical to international security for 70 years.
Yesterday @RepBeatty @senrobportman @SenSherrodBrown & I introduced legislation to preserve @AviationHeritag. Learn more here: https://t.co/5qwQ8Cq5kU

This afternoon I joined @FoxNews's @OutnumberedOT with @HARRISFAULKNER to discuss the Special Counsel's report. https://t.co/AHJqufF9W9
As a member of @HouseIntelComm I look forward to reviewing this report and working towards making this information public as soon as possible.

This exhaustive report came to the same conclusion that the @HouseIntelComm arrived at: "The investigation did not establish that members of the Trump Campaign conspired or coordinated with the Russian government in its election interference activities."
Thank you @POTUS for your strong support of our military and #OH jobs!

As Chairman of House Armed Services Subcommittee on Tactical Air and Land I authorized millions of $ in @USArmy upgrades on hundreds of M1 Abrams tanks. We kept the Lima plant open. With @POTUS’s buildup @GD_LandSystems now plans to add hundreds of jobs at the Lima tank plant. https://t.co/0avDP1g62Q

To all of my Irish neighbors in #OH10 Happy #StPatricksDay🇮🇪 https://t.co/bXjSsGENiB

I look forward to reviewing this report once it reaches its conclusion. https://t.co/KykfsUiyAL

As I have repeatedly stated the Special Counsel’s report must be made public so we can continue to have faith in our electoral system. As a member of @HouseIntelComm I have continuously supported releasing transcripts from this investigation to the public.
A great meeting yesterday in my #DC office with some members of @hhohio and @Kettering_OH to discuss infrastructure investment and improvements in our #OH10 community #NLCCCC https://t.co/6GAtxLerFO
🚨🚨🚨The 1st step in securing the remaining funds for @WrightPattAFB's new NASIC building are in @WhiteHouse budget. Read more + my full statement here: https://t.co/hYgCWAG0Ia

I stand in strong support of continued and increased pressure on the Kremlin to hold Vladimir Putin accountable for his reprehensible actions. https://t.co/smhnZpmjPt

In recent years we have seen the Russian annexation of Crimea; the Kremlin’s murder and attempted murders of Russian citizens for speaking out against Putin; and Russia’s continued interference in democratic elections including here in the United States.
As a former President of NATO Parliamentary Assembly I have witnessed rapidly increasing Russian aggression.
On Friday I joined @FoxNews's @seanhannity to discuss whether Michael Cohen was coached by Democratic staff before his appearances at House and Senate committees. https://t.co/U0yz59hZV0

Great to chat yesterday with @ChrisEvans about why I got into politics my efforts to protect child custody rights of our nation's servicemembers and @NATO's importance in an increasingly complex world of threats. https://t.co/45LBIQWS9l
I wish Heather all the best in her future endeavors. She will be deeply missed. Hopefully someday we can see Heather Wilson as the first female Secretary of Defense.

.@SecAFOfficial Heather Wilson is a dear friend and former colleague of mine. The importance of her incredible work in @usairforce cannot be overstated. It is not surprising to me that Heather would be sought out by other organizations looking for her strong leadership.

This level of coaching of a witness is highly unprofessional and inappropriate and any claim to the contrary is complete nonsense.   Read my full statement reacting to Democrats' coaching of Michael Cohen➡https://t.co/VhbjJzuyqe https://t.co/fBq7Y9yXhZ
Today at #HASC I questioned @HASCDemocrats witnesses about nuclear deterrence policy and posture. #WATCH: https://t.co/Z5onio9yIa
Congratulations @repdonyoung on becoming the longest serving Republican member of Congress in history!

In my opinion the answers to these questions will be shocking to the American public. Read more here: https://t.co/QRHAbyDnFr https://t.co/2gaRx9hp1h

At today's @HouseIntelComm hearing I asked @madeleine about Russian aggression. She then apologized to @SenatorRomney for her comments in 2012 that "underestimated what was going on in Russia." Click to watch the full clip: https://t.co/IJ99o3mcD0 https://t.co/Zkf6IyXGAn

#OnThisDay in 1927 Erma Bombeck was born in Bellbrook #OH. Erma was a national voice for Midwest suburbia in the late 20th century. May her legacy of speaking out with wit continue to live on. #OH10 https://t.co/Bx91aqI6Ya
My full statement on today’s signing of Space Policy Directive - 4: https://t.co/hwv1m6aRDj
To read more visit https://t.co/OJRFQx2cWk
As I have voiced to this Administration repeatedly I strongly believe securing our border should not be done at the expense of previously funded military construction projects.
However I believe it is a dangerous precedent for the President to be forced to declare a national emergency because Congress refuses to provide necessary funding to protect our country.
